# getResult() | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Swift ](/documentation/swift)

-  getResult() 

Instance Method# getResult()

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+watchOS 6.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
func getResult() async -> Result<Success, Failure>
```

Available when `Success` conforms to `Sendable` and `Failure` conforms to `Error`.Deprecated

getResult() has been replaced by .result
